item.description:
The South Windsor Jaycees are hosting their 3rd annual
Halloween Pancake Breakfast on Saturday, October 29th!

Come out with the family and enjoy pancakes
(including our famous pumpkin pancakes!)
sausage, juice and more all for the great price of free!

That’s right, there is no charge but, the Jaycees are asking
for monetary donations for the South Windsor Food & Fuel Bank in
conjunction with our annual Thanksgiving Baskets for the
Needy project that provides more than 100 less fortunate
families in South Windsor with a lovely Thanksgiving dinner.

In addition to having a great breakfast there will be crafts
for the kids and holiday photo opportunities. Children are
welcome to wear costumes.

The Jaycees want you to plan on joining us for breakfast
from 8 a.m. – noon at Fire Department Company 1 at
1175 Ellington Road in South Windsor.
No reservations are needed. 

Volunteers needed 7 a.m. - 1 p.m.
item.name: Halloween Pancake Breakfast
